com.att.ads
Class AdLog

java.lang.Object
  com.att.ads.AdLog

public class AdLog
extends Object

Customized Logger to enable and disable the logger as user required. And also a single place to control all the logging options.

Author:
ATT

Constructor Detail

AdLog

public AdLog(ATTAdView adView)
Construct logging object.

Parameters:
adView - Base view object associated with logging
Method Detail

setDefaultLogLevel

public static void setDefaultLogLevel(int logLevel)
Set default log level to one of the log level values defined in he AdLog class (corresponding to errors, errors + warnings, or everything including server traffic.)

Parameters:
logLevel - Int log level to set as the default value (initially NONE).

log

public void log(int Level,
                int Type,
                String tag,
                String msg)
Log a message

Parameters:
Level - Int logging level, from 0 (none) to 3 (errors, warnings and server traffic)
Type - Log Int message type, 1 (error, 2 (warning) or 3 (info)
tag - String log message tag
msg - String log message detail

setLogLevel

public void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
Set log message level to be recorded; log events at a higher level are ignored.

Parameters:
logLevel - Int log level to be recorded
